Section.Label: Chapter_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_of_methods
Section.Heading: ramp automatic generated documentation of methods

ManSection.Description: Returns the rotation subgroup of the universal Coxeter Group of rank n.
Returns the rotation subgroup of the Coxeter Group with Schlafli symbol sym.

Section.Label: Chapter_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_Section_ramp_automatic_generated_documentation_of_global_functions
Section.Heading: ramp automatic generated documentation of global functions

ManSection.Description: Calls Maniplex(args) and marks the output as polytopal.
Calls ReflexibleManiplex(args) and marks the output as polytopal. Also available as ARP(args).
Calls RotaryManiplex(args) and marks the output as polytopal.

Given a list L and an object x, this calls Append(L, x) if x is a list; otherwise it calls Add(L, x). Note that since strings are internally represented as lists, AddOrAppend(L, "foo") will append the characters 'f', 'o', 'o'.
